name: The Last Sea Monster
description:
Defend the fishing village from the Horrible Sea Monster!

Use the Left/Right Arrow Keys or A/D Keys to move left and right.

Press the left mouse mutton or the CTRL key to shoot your weapon.

If you die, don't worry, someone else from the village will step up to defend against the beast (assuming the village isn't all dead already)!

Tell us how many people you saved in the comments below!
